org.sindice.siren.analysis

Class NumericAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer
      • org.sindice.siren.analysis.NumericAnalyzer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DoubleNumericAnalyzer, FloatNumericAnalyzer, IntNumericAnalyzer, LongNumericAnalyzer

    public abstract class NumericAnalyzer
extends org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer
    Abstraction over the analyzer for numeric datatype.

    At indexing time, this class provides a NumericTokenizer for indexing numeric values that can be used by a NodeNumericRangeQuery. At query time, this class acts as a container for parameters that are required in the query parsers to process numeric range queries.

    See NodeNumericRangeQuery for more information about numeric range queries.
